016package org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.exceptions;
017
018import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
019import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
020import java.util.function.BiFunction;
021import java.util.function.Consumer;
022import java.util.function.Function;
023import java.util.function.Supplier;
024
025import org.jdbi.v3.core.internal.UtilityClassException;
026
027public class Unchecked {
028    private Unchecked() {
029        throw new UtilityClassException();
030    }
031
032    public static <T> Consumer<T> consumer(CheckedConsumer<T> checkedConsumer) {
033        return (x) -> {
034            try {
035                checkedConsumer.accept(x);
036            } catch (Throwable t) {
037                throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(t);
038            }
039        };
040    }
041
042    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DoNotUseThreads")
043    public static Runnable runnable(CheckedRunnable checkedRunnable) {
044        return () -> {
045            try {
046                checkedRunnable.run();
047            } catch (Throwable t) {
048                throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(t);
049            }
050        };
051    }
052
053    public static <T> SneakyCallable<T> callable(CheckedCallable<T> checkedCallable) {
054        return () -> {
055            try {
056                return checkedCallable.call();
057            } catch (Throwable t) {
058                throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(t);
059            }
060        };
061    }
062
063    public static <T> Supplier<T> supplier(CheckedSupplier<T> checkedSupplier) {
064        return () -> {
065            try {
066                return checkedSupplier.get();
067            } catch (Throwable t) {
068                throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(t);
069            }
070        };
071    }
072
073    public static <X, T> Function<X, T> function(CheckedFunction<X, T> checkedFunction) {
074        return x -> {
075            try {
076                return checkedFunction.apply(x);
077            } catch (Throwable t) {
078                throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(t);
079            }
080        };
081    }
082
083    public static <X, Y, T> BiFunction<X, Y, T> biFunction(CheckedBiFunction<X, Y, T> checkedBiFunction) {
084        return (x, y) -> {
085            try {
086                return checkedBiFunction.apply(x, y);
087            } catch (Throwable t) {
088                throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(t);
089            }
090        };
091    }
092
093    public static <X, Y> BiConsumer<X, Y> biConsumer(CheckedBiConsumer<X, Y> checkedBiConsumer) {
094        return (x, y) -> {
095            try {
096                checkedBiConsumer.accept(x, y);
097            } catch (Throwable t) {
098                throw Sneaky.throwAnyway(t);
099            }
100        };
101    }
102
103    public interface SneakyCallable<T> extends Callable<T> {
104        @Override
105        T call(); // no 'throws Exception'
106    }
107
108    public interface CheckedRunnable {
109        void run() throws Exception;
110    }
111}
